title: grammar - Lesson 1
content: French grammar is a set of rules governing the French language. It includes syntax, morphology, and phonetics. To master French, it is essential to understand these rules well.

title: verb - Lesson 2
content: The verb is a central element of the French sentence. Verb conjugation varies according to tense, mood, and person. First group verbs end in -er.

title: pronunciation - Lesson 3
content: French pronunciation requires particular attention to nasal sounds. French vowels are more numerous than in other languages. Stress plays an important role.
